articles.title: Boba Shortage Could Stretch Into Summer, Leave Businesses In A Bind - NPR
articles.description: What's bubble tea without boba? Americans are starting to find out. A backlog at shipping docks is stalling the arrival of the popular chewy pearls at tea shops across the country.
articles.content:
A lack of dockworkers at shipping ports and a shortage of drivers is creating a boba backlog in the U.S., according to a nationwide supplier of bubble tea products.
